g.text: Hunspell - Check Spelling A - upper case or capitalized
root = check_word(cleaned word period added at end, info, root)
handle apostrophe for Catalan, French and Italian prefixes
make cleaned word all lower case and then make it capitalized
root AND keepcase(root)??? AND captype is all upper case?
root OR idot AND some language specific condition?
make cleaned word all lower case
add period to end of u8buffer
add period to end of u8buffer
root AND keepcase(root)??? and captype is all upper case?
root AND keepcase(root)??? AND (captype is all upper case OR German sharp s)?
captype is capitalized OR (all upper case AND no root)?
